name: Meteor Slasher
description:
Here you can take on the role of a rescuer of the Earth. Meteorites fall to the Ground, which you need to destroy with the help of a tank. For each meteorite you can get coins, and for them you can buy new guns for your tank.

So, go and SAVE THE EARTH! SLASH THE METEORS! EARN THE COINS!

If you see a console panel, click the "Close" button in the bottom of the window.

Controls:

A - Move to left.

D - Move to right.

Left Mouse Click - Shoot.

Description of Mechanics:

You can shoot meteorites flying to Earth. When you destroy a meteorite, it splits into two pieces and flies down. There are 3 types of meteorite in the game: brown (the weakest), green (medium) and red (the strongest).
